title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 399.4 - Speed limit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 399.4 - Speed limit

State Regulations

No person shall operate a motor vehicle in any park at a
rate of speed in excess of 40 miles per hour on any park road or in excess of
15 miles per hour in any parking field, except where specifically modified by
signs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
399.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
